title: Help! (mac users) Once I log into league I get a blank client.
body:
After I log into league on my mac the client goes blank.

Things I've tried:
Restarting my client
Restarting my computer
Reinstalling league
Updating my MacBook's operating system

Before I updated my mac I couldn't get to the log in screen, but now that I have I got a little bit further and actually logged in. It just goes to a blank screen after I log in :(

replies.body: The black screen might indicate a network issue having problems establishing a connection to the server or downloading assets.  I suggest going through each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this.  Make sure to select the Mac option for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
